COMMENT: Flask settings: whatever Flaks needs to work normally
COMMENT_ui_local_path: Delete or leave empty to stop ZMW from serving a UI
COMMENT_www_extra: If present, will set an additional directory to serve files from. The prefix must start with a slash and not be /www
COMMENT: MQTT settings: how to connect to MQTT
The topic prefix that zibee2mqtt will be using
The topic to use when forwarding messages to websocket

Sensor history settings. Retention rows and days are both optional. When both are specified, it will take the most restrictive option (ie if days=2 and rows=0, no rows will be stored). When none are specified, no measurements are ever deleted.
Spotify settings, leave out to disable Spotify integration
Sonos settings, leave out to skip loading the Sonos module
